alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cass County through 345 AM CDT... At 315 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Durbin, or 15 miles west of Fargo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mapleton around 340 AM CDT. West Fargo and Prosper around 345 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Casselton Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 57 and 61. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 331 and 348. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
